summary: FOXITE Phase 4A Testing Complete - All features working correctly. Public website accessible without auth, authenticated users redirected to dashboard, pricing shows correct plans (CORE $25, PLUS $55, PRIME $90 - no SCALE), role-based Settings access working (Admin/Supervisor can access, Technician cannot), notification API endpoints functional, ticket CRUD operations working.
critical_code_review_comments: Email notifications are MOCKED - using placeholder Resend API key (re_placeholder_add_your_key). Emails will be skipped until valid API key is configured.
Minor ESLint warnings in App.js for missing useEffect dependencies (lines 62, 1194, 1393, 1495) - not blocking but should be addressed
seed_data_creation: Test tickets created with TEST_ prefix during backend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 4A features fully tested and working. Backend notification service exists but email sending is MOCKED (placeholder API key). Public website routes (/, /features, /pricing, /login) work without auth and redirect authenticated users to dashboard. Settings page protected - only Admin/Supervisor can access, Technician is blocked. Pricing page shows 3 plans: Core ($25), Plus ($55), Prime/Pro ($90) - no Scale plan.

public_website.pricing_page: PASS - shows Core $25, Plus $55, Prime $90 (no Scale)

role_based_access.technician_settings: PASS - cannot access Settings (redirected to dashboard)
role_based_access.technician_sidebar: PASS - Settings not visible in sidebar

mocked_apis.email_notifications: MOCKED - Resend API key is placeholder, emails will be skipped
